headline: Comcast: A Broadband Reset Cannot Be Half-Hearted
summary: Comcast faces broadband challenges with record losses, while media and parks show resilience.

headline: Verizon Remains A Buy Post-Earnings
summary: Verizon shows improved EPS growth yet faces concerns over cash flow and subscribers. Undervalued with a 6.34% yield, it offers an attractive risk/reward.
